verbose_text: To determine the association between the TQ induced generation of ROS, dedifferentiation and COX-2 expression and the activation of MAPKs and PI3K, we inhibited the phosphorylation of MAPKs and PI3K using specific inhibitors (SB203580 for p38, PD98059 for ERK, LY294002 for PI3K / Akt and SP600125 for JNK) prior to treatment with TQ (XREF_FIG).
